column4: hello, I've got a little problem, every time some screensaver kicks in, it freezes my whole system, ctrl-alt-del and ctrl-alt backspace don't work or anything... is there anything I can do to solve that?
gl screensaver?

hard locks the entire system?

tell me about it...
it is just a package that depends on all the other packages needed for a full system
apt-cache show ubuntu-desktop
and look at the depends field
so it can be removed? (that way I can remove xscreensaver-gl too
you could also just disable xscreensaver you know ;)
sure, remove it
it is just a meta package that pulls in the rest
if you remove it, all the ones it brought in stay around :)
that solved it.. so if anyone has the same problem you know what to do :)
